name: AlienPewPew
description:
Short but interesting game about unequal fight against alien aggressors... Okay, we didn't care about the story. It's just an endless shooter with three weapons and five upgrades. Enjoy the game.

You can download it here: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1j6pqLaLJqp-nelgIkwyohwKbd37bjDKH
